# ctx

Context against which to authenticate action.

## Fields

- **vp**: File to authorize action for.
- **action**: kauth-style action to be checked for permissions, e.g. KAUTH_VNODE_DELETE.

items.description: kauth-style action to be checked for permissions, e.g. KAUTH_VNODE_DELETE.
